title: Unified Configuration System with Multi-Cloud Secrets
description: Complete configuration architecture: env/file backends (Phase 1), AWS/Azure/GCP backends (Phase 2), Vault auth methods (Phase 3), Doppler + migration tooling (Phase 4). New CLI commands: nthlayer config show/set/init, nthlayer secrets list/verify/set/get/migrate. Supports 7 secret backends with unified resolution chain.
